>Construction of pLYC15
acquire oligo ZH13			
acquire oligo ZH13R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH14
acquire oligo ZH14R
acquire plasmid pLYC10
acquire genomic_dna MG1655_ispDF
PCR ZH13,ZH2R on pLYC10	(4396 bp, pcrA15)
PCR ZH2,ZH14R on pLYC10	(3929 bp, pcrB15)
PCR ZH14,ZH13R on MG1655_ispDF (1271 bp, pcrC15)
Assemble pcrA15,pcrB15,pcrC15	(Gibson, pLYC15)
Transform pLYC15	(Mach1, Amp)
